the

—

was

by

the
american
ship
david
stewart
ol

674

having

bis

the

had

that
though
pardoned
they
were

to

that

their
native

to

it
was

sent
to
america
accordingly

was

imedens
ministrene
og

ogsaa
at

opfattelse
as

foruden

vi

og

af

skibspapirerne
